tasks.task_description: Create backup folder and backup current files
Examine the S3 setup script to identify VS Code installation issues
Fix VS Code server installation in the setup script or YAML

description: Fix VS Code server hanging issue in deploy-uswest2a-only.sh and yaml template
context: Created backup folder at /home/ajitn/qclispot-deployment/backup-20251207-033257/ with both deploy-uswest2a-only.sh and uswest2a-only-template.yaml files

Identified the issue: VS Code extension installation (especially Amazon Q extension) is hanging because it requires authentication or times out. The systemctl service start also waits indefinitely. Need to make extension installation non-blocking and add timeouts.
